content:
alexcrichton transferred Issue #979:

We might consider tests for is_ctrl_typevar_candidate and verify_polymorphic; not because they are so very complex but a couple of illustrative tests might explain how these functions work and ensure that when I touch this file I don't mess up the intended behavior :big_smile:.

_Originally posted by @abrown in https://github.com/CraneStation/cranelift/pull/969_
